title: 820-3435 occasionally restarts by itself
message: Have got an 820-3535 ... was has a bit of liquid , however it?s been cleaned out . It works not but would occasionally restart by itself, have replaced the keyboard but it?s still restarts, and the time between its restarts varies

title: 820-3435 occasionally restarts by itself
message: Since you are dealing with liquid damage there is probably some pad eaten under a component such as a resistor or a IC.  This one will be a hard one due to the intermittent nature of the problem.  I recommend removal of the board and crawling over it with a microscope and a probe checking to see if resistors and parts in the damaged areas are securely attached.   Also chips that have water damage on them I would pull to inspect pads.

title: 820-3435 occasionally restarts by itself
message:
Maybe need to reball SMC.

You can also heat CPU with good flux; just burn eventually crap accumulated underneath.
Finish with ultrasonic cleaner; be carefull, if no sweep option available.

title: 820-3435 occasionally restarts by itself
message: the issue was the Trackpad, thank you so much guys .
